issue.title: [R][CI] Run nightly R with valgrind
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12571](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12571). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The wch/r-debug container that we run the ASAN/UBSAN sanitizer job also has a valgrind version of R: https://github.com/wch/r-debug#docker-image-for-debugging-r-memory-problems

According to https://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/pub/bdr/memtests/README.txt, we possibly also should run R CMD check with --use-valgrind.
